persistence-unit.name: annotation-based-field-access
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE bean.name = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)

persistence-unit.name: annotation-based-field-access-criteria-access-rules-test
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'admin' IN (CURRENT_ROLES)
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'isNull' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name is null
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'isNotNull' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name is not null
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'inStaticStrings' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name in ('Foo', 'Bar')
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'inSubSelect' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b)
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'notRefInStaticStrings' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND NOT bean.name in ('Foo', 'Bar')
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'notRefInSubSelect' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND NOT bean.name in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b)
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'refNotInStaticStrings' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in ('Foo', 'Bar')
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'refNotInSubSelect' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b)

GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'subSelectJoining' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b, FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean p WHERE b.parent=p)

GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'subSelectJoiningMoreDotting' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b, FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean p WHERE b.parent.parent=p)
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'notEqual1' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b WHERE b.id != 0)
GRANT ACCESS TO FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean bean WHERE 'notEqual2' IN (CURRENT_ROLES) AND bean.name NOT in (SELECT b.name FROM FieldAccessAnnotationTestBean b WHERE b.id <> 0)

persistence-unit.name: acl-model
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT READ ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (-1 IN (CURRENT_ROLES))
GRANT ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (-2 IN (CURRENT_ROLES))

GRANT ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (bean.accessControlList is null OR EXISTS ( SELECT e FROM Acl acl JOIN acl.entries e WHERE acl = bean.accessControlList AND ( (e.group is null AND EXISTS (SELECT user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = e.privilege AND user.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL)) OR (e.privilege is null AND EXISTS (SELECT user2 FROM User user2 JOIN user2.groups group2 JOIN group2.fullHierarchy fullHierarchy2 WHERE user2.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL AND fullHierarchy2 = e.group)) OR (EXISTS (SELECT user3 FROM User user3 JOIN user3.groups groups3 JOIN groups3.fullHierarchy fullHierarchy3 WHERE user3.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL AND fullHierarchy3 = e.group) AND EXISTS (SELECT user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = e.privilege AND user.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL)) ) ))

persistence-unit.name: acl-model-nocache
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT READ ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (-1 IN (CURRENT_ROLES))
GRANT ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (-2 IN (CURRENT_ROLES))

GRANT ACCESS TO net.sf.jpasecurity.model.acl.AccessControlled bean WHERE (bean.accessControlList is null OR EXISTS ( SELECT /* QUERY_OPTIMIZE_NOCACHE */ e FROM Acl acl JOIN acl.entries e WHERE acl = bean.accessControlList AND ( (e.group is null AND EXISTS (SELECT /* QUERY_OPTIMIZE_NOCACHE */ user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = e.privilege AND user.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL)) OR (e.privilege is null AND EXISTS (SELECT /* QUERY_OPTIMIZE_NOCACHE */ user2 FROM User user2 JOIN user2.groups group2 JOIN group2.fullHierarchy fullHierarchy2 WHERE user2.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL AND fullHierarchy2 = e.group)) OR (EXISTS (SELECT /* QUERY_OPTIMIZE_NOCACHE */ user3 FROM User user3 JOIN user3.groups groups3 JOIN groups3.fullHierarchy fullHierarchy3 WHERE user3.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL AND fullHierarchy3 = e.group) AND EXISTS (SELECT /* QUERY_OPTIMIZE_NOCACHE */ user FROM User user JOIN user.roles role JOIN role.privileges privilege WHERE privilege = e.privilege AND user.id = CURRENT_PRINCIPAL)) ) ))
